original: 侯音與衛開南聯關羽，在南陽叛亂時，東里袞任南陽太守，被侯音挾持，但在南陽功曹宗子卿勸說下被釋放。之後宗子卿趁夜逃跑，與東里袞收聚殘兵，又會合曹仁，攻打侯因。襄樊之戰，東里袞隨于禁參戰，兵敗被關羽俘虜，關羽被東吳攻殺後，又輾轉為東吳所獲，才得以回返曹魏。
text: Hou Yin and Wei Kai joined Guan Yu in Nanyang. During the Nanyang Rebellion, Dongligun served as the prefect of Nanyang and was held hostage by Hou Yin, but was released under the persuasion of Nanyang Gong and Cao Zongziqing. After that, Zong Ziqing ran away at night, gathered the remnants with Dongligun, and joined Cao Ren to attack Hou Yin. In the battle of Xiangfan, Dongligun was banned from participating in the war, and was defeated and captured by Guan Yu. After Guan Yu was attacked and killed by the Soochow, he was captured by Soochow and was able to return to Cao Wei.
